prompt.name: prompt
prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.description: Text description of the desired video.
examples: Anime schoolgirl bursting out of house door, cherry blossoms blowing, morning light, speed lines indicating rush, chibi-ready expressions, classic shojo aesthetic, vibrant colors

duration.name: duration
duration.label: Duration
duration.description: Video duration in seconds. Default value: `6`

aspect_ratio.name: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.label: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video. Default value: `"16:9"`

resolution.name: resolution
resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.description: Resolution of the output video. Default value: `"720p"`
